AT.name: Just Dance® 2017
AT.description: Just Dance 2017 macht mehr Spaß und ist einfacher zu spielen denn je! Zum Spielen wird keine Kamera benötigt. Lade einfach die kostenlose Just Dance-Controller-App auf dein Smartphone, um mit bis zu 5 Freunden zu tanzen! Just Dance 2017 kommt am 27. Oktober mit über 40 Tracks im Gepäck. Weitere +200 Songs sind über Just Dance Unlimited verfügbar! Eine 3-monatige Probephase für Just Dance Unlimited ist im Spiel enthalten. Hier sind nur ein paar der musikalischen Highlights: • Sorry – Justin Bieber • Lean On – Major Lazer Ft. MØ & DJ Snake • Cheap Thrills – Sia Ft. Sean Paul • Worth It – Fifth Harmony ft. Kid Ink • Daddy – PSY ft. CL of 2NE1 • Don’t Stop Me Now – Queen • PoPiPo – Hatsune Miku • El Tiki – Maluma • … und viele mehr! Freue dich auf 6 Spielmodi, darunter die neue „Just Dance Machine“, passe deine Workouts mit „Sweat & Playlists“ an oder versuche, bei der „Dance Quest“ zu punkten! Erlebe Musik wie nie zuvor, mit umwerfender Grafik und atemberaubenden Choreografien.

AU.name: Just Dance® 2017
AU.description: Just Dance 2017 is more fun & easier to play than ever! No camera needed to play. Simply download the free Just Dance Controller App to your smartphone to dance with up to 5 friends! Just Dance 2017 is coming on October 27th with over 40 tracks at launch, and more than 200 songs available via Just Dance Unlimited! 3-month trial included with your game. Take a sneak peek at the tracklist below: • Sorry – Justin Bieber • Lean On – Major Lazer Ft. MØ & DJ Snake • Cheap Thrills – Sia Ft. Sean Paul • Worth It – Fifth Harmony ft. Kid Ink • Daddy – PSY ft. CL of 2NE1 • Don’t Stop Me Now – Queen • PoPiPo – Hatsune Miku • El Tiki – Maluma • …and many more! Enjoy 6 game modes including the new frantic “Just Dance Machine”, customize your workouts with “Sweat + Playlists', or try and beat the game with “Dance Quest”! Get ready for a music experience like no other, with amazing visuals and dance moves.

BE.name: Just Dance® 2017
BE.description: Just Dance 2017 est plus fun et simple à jouer que jamais ! Pas besoin de caméra, il vous suffit de télécharger gratuitement l'app Just Dance Controller sur votre smartphone pour pouvoir jouer avec jusqu'à 5 de vos amis ! Just Dance 2017 sera disponible le 27 octobre avec plus de 40 chansons dès sa sortie et plus de 200 chansons disponibles via Just Dance Unlimited ! 3 mois d'essai sont inclus avec le jeu. Petit aperçu de la tracklist : • Sorry – Justin Bieber • Lean On – Major Lazer Ft. MØ & DJ Snake • Cheap Thrills – Sia Ft. Sean Paul • Worth It – Fifth Harmony ft. Kid Ink • Daddy – PSY ft. CL of 2NE1 • Don’t Stop Me Now – Queen • PoPiPo – Hatsune Miku • El Tiki – Maluma • …et bien d'autres ! Découvrez 6 modes de jeu parmi lesquels le délirant “Just Dance Machine”, personnalisez vos sessions avec “Sweat + Playlists', ou essayez de battre le jeu avec “Dance Quest” ! Préparez-vous pour une expérience musicale inégalée, avec des graphismes et des mouvements incroyables !

ES.name: Just Dance® 2017
ES.description: ¡Just Dance 2017 es más divertido y fácil de jugar que nunca! No necesitas cámara. Solo tienes que descargar la app gratis Just Dance Controller en tu smartphone para bailar con hasta 5 amigos. Just Dance 2017 llega el 27 de octubre con más de 40 canciones en el lanzamiento, ¡y otras 200 más estarán disponibles en Just Dance Unlimited! El juego incluye tres meses de prueba gratis. Echa un vistazo a la lista de canciones: • Sorry – Justin Bieber • Lean On – Major Lazer Ft. MØ & DJ Snake • Cheap Thrills – Sia Ft. Sean Paul • Worth It – Fifth Harmony ft. Kid Ink • Daddy – PSY ft. CL of 2NE1 • Don’t Stop Me Now – Queen • PoPiPo – Hatsune Miku • El Tiki – Maluma • ¡Y muchas más! Disfruta de 6 modos de juego, incluyendo el frenético “Just Dance Machine”, personaliza tus rutinas con “Sweat + Playlists', ¡o intenta vencer al juego con “Dance Quest”! Prepárate para disfrutar de una experiencia como ninguna otra, con unos pasos y efectos visuales alucinantes.

IT.name: Just Dance® 2017
IT.description: Giocare a Just Dance 2017 è più facile e divertente che mai! Non serve una telecamera per giocare: scarica semplicemente l'app gratuita Just Dance Controller sul tuo smartphone e balla insieme a un massimo di 5 amici! Just Dance 2017 sarà pubblicato il 27 ottobre e conterrà oltre 40 nuove tracce e più di 200 brani disponibili attraverso Just Dance Unlimited! All'interno del gioco troverai un abbonamento di prova di 3 mesi. Dai un'occhiata alla nuova playlist: • Sorry – Justin Bieber • Lean On – Major Lazer Ft. MØ & DJ Snake • Cheap Thrills – Sia Ft. Sean Paul • Worth It – Fifth Harmony ft. Kid Ink • Daddy – PSY ft. CL of 2NE1 • Don’t Stop Me Now – Queen • PoPiPo – Hatsune Miku • El Tiki – Maluma • ...e tante altre! Scopri 6 modalità di gioco come la nuova frenetica 'Just Dance Machine', personalizza i tuoi allenamenti in 'Sweat e Playlist' o sfida il gioco nelle 'Dance Quest'! Preparati a un'esperienza musicale unica, con una grafica incredibile e passi eccezionali.

NL.name: Just Dance® 2017
NL.description: Just Dance 2017 is nu nog leuker en makkelijker om te spelen dan ooit! Je hebt geen camera nodig. Download de Just Dance Controller App op je smartphone en dans met maximaal 5 vrienden! Just Dance 2017 is verkrijgbaar vanaf 27 oktober en je kunt dan meteen dansen op 40 nummers plus meer dan 200 nummers via Just Dance Unlimited! Inclusief proefversie van 3 maanden. Hieronder alvast een voorproefje van de game: • Sorry – Justin Bieber • Lean On – Major Lazer Ft. MØ & DJ Snake • Cheap Thrills – Sia Ft. Sean Paul • Worth It – Fifth Harmony ft. Kid Ink • Daddy – PSY ft. CL of 2NE1 • Don’t Stop Me Now – Queen • PoPiPo – Hatsune Miku • El Tiki – Maluma • …en vele anderen! Speel 6 speltypen, waaronder het nieuwe, hectische Just Dance Machine, pas je workouts aan met 'Sweat + Playlists' of speel de game uit in 'Dance Quest'! Bereid je voor op een unieke muziekervaring, met ongelooflijke graphics en dansbewegingen.

PT.name: Just Dance® 2017
PT.description: O Just Dance 2017 é mais divertido e fácil de jogar que nunca! Não precisas da câmara, basta transferir a aplicação gratuita Just Dance Controller para smartphone e começar a dançar com até mais 5 amigos! O Just Dance 2017 vai chegar a 27 de outubro com mais de 40 faixas no lançamento e mais de 200 canções disponíveis no Just Dance Unlimited! O jogo inclui um período de avaliação de 3 meses. Podes espreitar parte da lista de faixas em baixo: • Sorry – Justin Bieber • Lean On – Major Lazer Ft. MØ & DJ Snake • Cheap Thrills – Sia Ft. Sean Paul • Worth It – Fifth Harmony ft. Kid Ink • Daddy – PSY ft. CL of 2NE1 • Don’t Stop Me Now – Queen • PoPiPo – Hatsune Miku • El Tiki – Maluma • …e muitas mais! Diverte-te com 6 modos, incluindo o novo e frenético “Just Dance Machine”, personaliza o teu exercício com “Sweat + Playlists” ou vence o jogo no “Dance Quest”! Prepara-te para uma experiência musical ímpar com um grafismo espantoso e movimentos de dança fantásticos.

RU.name: Just Dance® 2017
RU.description: Just Dance 2017 стала интереснее и доступнее, чем когда-либо! Для игры не нужна камера. Загрузите на смартфон бесплатное приложение Just Dance Controller и танцуйте вместе с друзьями! С вами могут танцевать до 5 человек. Just Dance 2017 выходит в этом октябре и на момент запуска там будет свыше 40 композиций, а через Just Dance Unlimited вам будет доступно 200 с лишним песен! В комплект с игрой входит 3-месячный пробный доступ. Новые игровые режимы, новая графика, новые движения!

SE.name: Just Dance® 2017
SE.description: Just Dance 2017 is more fun & easier to play than ever! No camera needed to play. Simply download the free Just Dance Controller App to your smartphone to dance with up to 5 friends! Just Dance 2017 is coming on October 27th with over 40 tracks at launch, and more than 200 songs available via Just Dance Unlimited! 3-month trial included with your game. Take a sneak peek at the tracklist below: • Sorry – Justin Bieber • Lean On – Major Lazer Ft. MØ & DJ Snake • Cheap Thrills – Sia Ft. Sean Paul • Worth It – Fifth Harmony ft. Kid Ink • Daddy – PSY ft. CL of 2NE1 • Don’t Stop Me Now – Queen • PoPiPo – Hatsune Miku • El Tiki – Maluma • …and many more! Enjoy 6 game modes including the new frantic “Just Dance Machine”, customize your workouts with “Sweat + Playlists', or try and beat the game with “Dance Quest”! Get ready for a music experience like no other, with amazing visuals and dance moves.
